"""
User asks for website and compares with a phone contact; include [ATTENTION].

ROLES: user (verifier), assistant (concise, tool-driven)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {"name":"contact","description":"Fetch channel","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"hid":{"type":"string"},"channel":{"type":"string","enum":["website","phone"]}},"required":["hid","channel"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}
]
```
"""

system:
SUMMARY
Name: Coral Spire Suites
hid: coral_spire
Website: https://www.coralspire.com
Phone: +971 4 602 7788
Extras:
- Skybridge pool; desert observatory nights Wed
- Ice maker on each floor wings A/B
- Water conservation: brine recovery system
- Airport line M2 direct to Lobby Gate
- Family studios with bunk alcoves

user:
Your website?

assistant channel=analysis:
Return via contact tool.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.contact:
{"hid":"coral_spire","channel":"website"}

tool.contact channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"website":"https://www.coralspire.com"}

assistant channel=final:
Website: https://www.coralspire.com

user:
Is +971 4 602 7788 also correct?

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm phone via tool.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.contact:
{"hid":"coral_spire","channel":"phone"}

tool.contact channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"phone":"+971 4 602 7788"}

assistant channel=final:
Yes, phone: +971 4 602 7788

user:
Do you publish your SOC 2 status?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] That certification detail isnâ€™t present in the context.
